    • About Dave Friedman


    2014 Best Realtor in Charleston Dave Friedman is committed to his work. This award, given to one Realtor out of more than 5,000, commemorates Dave’s dedication to his clients and his business. He has been named a Top Producing Realtor for 13 years and is in the top 1% of Realtors worldwide. Dave has closed hundreds of transactions over his 15+ years in real estate, earning a JD Power score of 9.5 in complete customer satisfaction for 5 years running. Dave works hard to get the deal you are looking for, averaging 4% more savings than the average transaction.

    Dave has spent the past 15+ years analyzing the home buying and selling process for his clients. He has dedicated his time to streamlining his processes and improving their results. Dave has surrounded himself with leading experts in the field and is committed to continuing his and his team’s education so that they can always ensure they are offering the best advice and information in today’s market. Dave’s clients know they are always receiving top-notch professionalism and expertise because they know that Dave’s passion is helping people and their families realize their dreams of home ownership.
